snippet.title: LEGO Math Star Wars: Three prisoners problem
snippet.description:
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away the force of mathematics was unleashed. Is the force strong with you?

***More on the problem***
This video was made as a fun way to promote mathematics using lego. We strongly encourage anyone who became interested in the problem to have a look at more strict explanations of the phenomenon. See e.g.:  
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Prisoners_problem
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Hall_problem

***Subscription and feedback***
If you enjoyed the video subscribe to our channel 
http://bit.ly/2cyK4Ts
and/or like us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/mathfigs/

If you have any ideas or remarks please email us:
mathfigs@gmail.com

Visit our faculty's and university's websites:
http://www.mini.pw.edu.pl/
https://www.pw.edu.pl/


***Apologies***
Yes, we know we used wrong lego storm trooper figs! We still hope it won't ruin the fun :) Sorry!

***Special Thanks***

Mathematics Theater "Temat"
Fryderyk Chopin Music University

Tony Barrett
Krzysztof Bryś
Łukasz Radomski
Ewelina Szczęsna
Tomasz Traczyk
Krzysztof Traczyk
